virtual_robot.controller

Class VirtualBot

  • java.lang.Object
    • virtual_robot.controller.VirtualBot
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MechanumBot, TwoWheelBot, XDriveBot

    public abstract class VirtualBot
extends java.lang.Object
    For internal use only. Abstract base class for all of the specific robot configurations.
